modelCorrections.afterModification:
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=no">
- Observation: The meta element above has user-scalable set to no which disables zooming on mobile devices.
- Thought: I need to change the user-scalable value to yes to allow zooming on mobile devices according to WCAG 2.1.
- Action: replace[content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=yes"]
- Corrected HTML: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=yes">
modelCorrections.rawOutput:
- Incorrect HTML: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=no">
- Observation: The meta element above has user-scalable set to no which disables zooming on mobile devices.
- Thought: I need to change the user-scalable value to yes to allow zooming on mobile devices according to WCAG 2.1.
- Action: replace[content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=yes"]
- Corrected HTML: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=yes">
